about_the_game:
THE YEAR IS SOMETHING SOMETHING SOMETHING AD

After an accident involving a newly purchased Para-CoTM firearm leaves you in control of other versions of yourself from other timelines, you must fight your way through hordes of machines, battling through multiple realities at the same time. Fighting through thick and thin all to get to Para-Co headquarters to get. your. refund

Split

The accident has left you quantumly untethered (whatever that means), meaning that with every new weapon you try to pick up, you instead create a new timeline where you wield that weapon, which you must now play alongside your base reality

Shoot

Every version of yourself controls the same, but the world around them is disconnected from other timelines. Make sure to keep track on each of them

Sacrifice

Not everyone has to make it to the finish, as long as there's at least one of you still standing by the end that's a win in our book

name: ParaGlock

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 800 MB RAM
  • Storage: 102 MB available space

short_description: ParaGlock is an experimental first person shooter, where every weapon picked up creates a new timeline you must play alongside
